description: Explore the world of programming languages and their practical applications.

courses.title: JavaScript
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript, a versatile language for web development.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Introduction to JavaScript syntax, data types, DOM manipulation, and event handling.

levels.title: JavaScript ES5 vs ES6
levels.description: Understand the differences between ES5 and ES6 (and later) JavaScript.

courses.title: CSharp
courses.description: Learn C# and build robust applications with this powerful language.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Introduction to C# syntax, data types, and object-oriented programming.

description: Understand the concepts and technologies that form the foundation of modern networks.

courses.title: Network Protocols
courses.description: Dive deep into network protocols and their role in data communication.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Introduction to TCP/IP, UDP, and common network protocols.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Advanced topics in network protocols, including routing and security.

description: Frontend development with React.js and related technologies.

courses.title: JavaScript
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript, a versatile language for web development.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Introduction to JavaScript syntax, data types, DOM manipulation, and event handling.

levels.title: JavaScript ES5 vs ES6
levels.description: Understand the differences between ES5 and ES6 (and later) JavaScript.

courses.title: TypeScript
courses.description: Learn TypeScript, a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Introduction to TypeScript syntax, types, interfaces, and classes.

courses.title: React.Js
courses.description: Build dynamic user interfaces with React.js.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Introduction to React components, JSX, and state management.

levels.title: Hooks
levels.description: Using React Hooks for stateful logic and side effects.

levels.title: StyledComponents
levels.description: Styling React components using Styled Components.

levels.title: JSX
levels.description: Deep dive into JSX syntax and its usage in React components.

levels.title: Tailwind
levels.description: Styling React components using Tailwind CSS.

levels.title: AntD
levels.description: Utilizing Ant Design React UI library for component-based development.

levels.title: Redux Saga
levels.description: Handling side effects with Redux Saga.

levels.title: TanStack Query (React Query)
levels.description: Data fetching and state management with TanStack Query (React Query).

courses.title: Next.Js
courses.description: Build server-side rendered React applications with Next.js.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Introduction to Next.js, including routing and server-side rendering.

description: Explore fundamental concepts in computer science.
